title: jay.fish
short: About this website showing my projects, blog and other cool things.
description: My personal website (jay.fish). This site is used for ramblings and interesting things, seeing what I am currently doing (e.g. what I'm listening to) and a list of my projects and past work.

title: csref.dev
short: A collection of Lecture notes, etc from my BSc (Hons) Degree.
description: A collection of Lecture notes, etc from my BSc (Hons) Degree, and other useful information and guides (still being made!)

title: forminator.gg
short: Forms that don't feel like homework.
description: My discord bot which enables servers to use and manage collecting data for staff, or for member feedback easier, with load of stats and analytics.
